snippet: Edward J. Snowden orchestrated an elaborate plan to reveal the closely guarded secrets he had emerged with from deep inside the American national security apparatus.
abstract: Edward J Snowden's elaborate plan to reveal closely guarded secrets he extracted from deep inside America's national security apparatus was well orchestrated and meticulously thought out; it is unclear how Snowden was able to extract documents, transforming him from trusted National Security Agency contractor to leaker.

byline.original: By CHARLIE SAVAGE and MARK MAZZETTI
byline.contributor: Christopher Drew and Richard A. Oppel Jr. contributed reporting from New York, and Theo Emery from Ellicott City, Md.

lead_paragraph: Edward J. Snowden orchestrated an elaborate plan to reveal the closely guarded secrets he had emerged with from deep inside the American national security apparatus.

headline.seo: How Edward J. Snowden Orchestrated a Blockbuster Story
headline.main: Cryptic Overtures and a Clandestine Meeting Gave Birth to a Blockbuster Story
headline.print_headline: Cryptic Overtures and a Clandestine Meeting Gave Birth to a Blockbuster Story
